T02D1891:214b-1: su bishti s'a dha no pa yi ka bod skad du /
T02D1891:214b-2: rab tu gsal ba zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs /
T02D1891:214b-3: bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo ;
T02D1891:214b-4: / ye shes zhabs la phyag 'tshal te /
T02D1891:214b-5: de'i gzhung rdo rje can sgrub thabs //
T02D1891:214b-6: slob ma blo gros chung don du //
T02D1891:214b-7: rab tu gsal bar bshad par bya //
T02D1891:214b-8: rtsom pa'i nus pa med na yang //
T02D1891:214b-9: snying rje yis ni drangs pa yis //
T02D1891:214b-10: bu la phan par 'dod pa'i ma //
T02D1891:214b-11: rang gi nus pa 'jal mi byed //
T02D1891:214b-12: de la rnal 'byor pa snying rjes byang chub tu
T02D1891:214b-13: sems bskyed pa sbyin pa la sogs pa la brtson
T02D1891:214b-14: pa / stong pa nyid la lhag par mos pa
T02D1891:214b-15: gsang ba 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor du ji lta ba
T02D1891:214b-16: bzhin du dbang bskur ba rjes su gnang ba thob
T02D1891:214b-17: pa bsgom pa'i cho ga la shin tu mkhas pas
T02D1891:214b-18: pa / / ri bo la sogs pa'i phyogs 'ga' zhig tu /
T02D1891:214b-19: bsam gtan gyi khang pa rdzas la sogs pas nye
T02D1891:214b-20: bar byugs par stan shin tu 'jam pa la 'dug
T02D1891:214b-21: ste rang gi snying gar zla ba la gnas pa'i
T02D1891:214b-22: h'um gnas te / de'i 'od zer las byung ba'i
T02D1891:214b-23: gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa rnams kyis nam mkha'
T02D1891:214b-24: la bzhugs pa'i bla ma dang /
T02D1891:215a-0: @215a * // sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yang dag par mchod nas sdig pa bshags pa dang /
T02D1891:215a-1: bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang /
T02D1891:215a-2: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang lam la gnas pa dang /
T02D1891:215a-3: bdag nyid dbul ba yang byas nas stong pa nyid bsgoms la /
T02D1891:215a-4: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sv'a bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1891:215a-5: zhes bya bas byin gyis rlob bo //
T02D1891:215a-6: de nas der nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i
T02D1891:215a-7: h'um las byung ba'i rdo rje'i lte bar nyi ma
T02D1891:215a-8: la gnas pa'i h'um las spros pa'i 'od zer gyis
T02D1891:215a-9: bgegs kyi tshogs rnams pham par byas nas 'od zer
T02D1891:215a-10: de yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje dra ba
T02D1891:215a-11: dang rdo rje ra ba dang rdo rje'i rang bzhin
T02D1891:215a-12: can gyi rnam par bsams la /
T02D1891:215a-13: de'i nang du chos 'byung ba gyen dkar gnas pa /
T02D1891:215a-14: nang khong stong dbus na sna tshogs padma la sna tshogs rdo rje bsams la /
T02D1891:215a-15: der yi ge brum dang 'khor lo las byung ba'i rnam par snang mdzad sku mdog dkar ba /
T02D1891:215a-16: dkar po dang nag po dang dmar po ste zhal
T02D1891:215a-17: gsum mnga' ba phyag drug las phyag gnyis kyis rang
T02D1891:215a-18: dang 'dra ba'i rig ma dam pa la 'khyud pa
T02D1891:215a-19: / phyag lhag ma rnams la 'khor lo dang ral
T02D1891:215a-20: gri dang padma dang rin po che bsnams pa rim
T02D1891:215a-21: / bzhin bsams la / de yongs su gyur pa
T02D1891:215a-22: las gzhal yas khang gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi
T02D1891:215a-23: pa rta babs bzhi la sogs pas brgyan pa /
T02D1891:215a-24: lha bcu dgu'i gnas sna tshogs padma la gnas pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bdun dang /
T02D1891:215a-25: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bcu gnyis kyi gdan dang ldan pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1891:215a-26: de'i dbus ma'i gdan la aa la sogs pa nyis 'gyur du byas pa las /
T02D1891:215a-27: mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis su gyur pa'i zla ba'i
T02D1891:215a-28: dkyil 'khor dang yi ge ka la sogs par da
T02D1891:215a-29: dha da dha ya la dang bcas nyis 'gyur du
T02D1891:215a-30: byas pa'i cha'i rnam par dag pa dpe byad bzang
T02D1891:215a-31: po brgyad cu ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'o
T02D1891:215a-32: ; / de'i steng du h'um las byung ba'i rdo
T02D1891:215a-33: rje dmar po lte ba la h'um gis mtshan pa
T02D1891:215a-34: ; bsams la / aom badzra sv'a bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1891:215a-35: zhes bya bas nga rgyal bya'o //
T02D1891:215a-36: de nas yi ge h'um las 'od zer spros pas
T02D1891:215a-37: 'gro ba rnams rdo rje 'chang dang 'dra bar byas
T02D1891:215a-38: la de nyid du bsdus te zla ba dang rdo
T02D1891:215b-0: rje yongs su @215b gyur pa las rdo rje sems
T02D1891:215b-1: dpa' rnam par snang mdzad dang 'dra dang 'dra bar
T02D1891:215b-3: khyad par ni 'khor lo'i gnas su rdo rje bsnams pa rin po che'i cod pan dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1891:215b-4: de'i rjes la 'dod chags chen pos 'dul ba'i snod
T02D1891:215b-5: kyi 'jig rten la dmigs nas rab tu dga' ba'i
T02D1891:215b-6: sgras rgyal ba'i tshogs rnams rang gi lus la bcug
T02D1891:215b-7: ste / bde ba dang ldan par bton la spyan
T02D1891:215b-8: la sogs pa lha mo dgu'i gzugs su rang rig
T02D1891:215b-9: pa'i lha mo'i nang du chud par bya'o //
T02D1891:215b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga po rang gi kha nas bcug ste /
T02D1891:215b-11: lus kyi nang du chud par byas la /
T02D1891:215b-12: rdo rje'i lam nas byang chub sems zhu ba'i rang
T02D1891:215b-13: bzhin du phyung la h'um gis byin gyis brlab par
T02D1891:215b-14: bsams pa las / rdo rje 'chang bdag por gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams sprul la /
T02D1891:215b-15: der sems can rnams bcug la yang de bzhin gshegs
T02D1891:215b-16: pa thams cad bcug pa'i ye shes kyi bdud rtsis
T02D1891:215b-17: sngar gyi sems can rnams dbang bskur la dbyung bar
T02D1891:215b-18: bya ste / kshim dzrim kham bam shkam sam zhes bya ba'i sa bon las go rims bzhin du /
T02D1891:215b-24: yid kyi rang bzhin sa'i snying po dang /
T02D1891:215b-28: sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang /
T02D1891:215b-29: kun du bzang po lta bur gyur pa gdon pa dang /
T02D1891:215b-30: dza: h'um bam ho: kham ram zhes bya ba las gzugs dang /
T02D1891:215b-35: chos kyi rang bzhi gzugs rdo rje dang /
T02D1891:215b-40: chos kyi dbyings yi rdo rje lta bur gyur pa dang /
T02D1891:215b-41: l'am m'am p'am t'am aa ta /
T02D1891:215b-42: zhes bya ba las sa dang /
T02D1891:215b-44: me dang rlung gi rang bzhin spyan ma dang /
T02D1891:215b-47: sgrol ma lta bur gyur pa dang /
T02D1891:215b-48: bhr'um a'am dzr'im kham h'um zhes bya ba las /
T02D1891:215b-53: rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin rnam par snam par snang mdzad dang /
T02D1891:215b-57: mi bskyod pa lta bur gyur pa dbyung bar bya'o //
T02D1891:216a-0: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo yang bsams par mi @216a * //
T02D1891:216a-4: zhes bya ba'i yi ge gsum po sku dang /
T02D1891:216a-6: thugs kyi rang bzhin can yi ge ho gnyis dang
T02D1891:216a-7: spel ba rang dang 'dra ba'i rig ma'i chags pa'i
T02D1891:216a-8: stobs kyis zhu bar gyur par bsams la /
T02D1891:216a-9: yang de'i stobs kyis bdag nyid dang rang gi rig
T02D1891:216a-10: pa yang 'dod chags chen po'i tshul gyis ting nge
T02D1891:216a-12: spyan la sogs pa'i glu'i sgras bskul bar bya'o //
T02D1891:216a-13: sems can khams ni gnas kyi dbang phyug khyod ni rdo rje'i thugs //
T02D1891:216a-14: dga' ba'i yid 'ong don chen 'dod pa dag la skyabs su gsol //
T02D1891:216a-15: mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na //
T02D1891:216a-16: sems can yab chen gnyen mchog bdag la dgyes par mdzad du gsol //
T02D1891:216a-17: rdo rje sku khyod bka' yi 'khor lo sems can kun la phan //
T02D1891:216a-18: sangs rgyas don du byang chub don dam rab tu phan par gzigs //
T02D1891:216a-19: mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na //
T02D1891:216a-20: 'dod chags dam tshig chags pas bdag la dgyes par mdzad du gsol //
T02D1891:216a-21: khyod ni rdo rje'i gsung ste kun la phan zhing thugs brtse na //
T02D1891:216a-22: 'jig rten dag gi don dang dgos pa mdzad la rab tu brtson //
T02D1891:216a-23: mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na //
T02D1891:216a-24: dga' ba'i spyod pa kun du bzang pos bdag la dgyes par mdzad du gsol //
T02D1891:216a-25: khyod ni rdo rje'i spyod pa dgyes zer dam tshig mchog gi phan don che //
T02D1891:216a-26: yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi gdung mchog mnyam nyid thugs brtse bas //
T02D1891:216a-27: mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na //
T02D1891:216a-28: yon tan rin chen mang po'i gter gyur bdag la dgyes par mdzod //
T02D1891:216a-29: de ltar bskul ba'i dbang gis zhu ba las byung
T02D1891:216a-30: ba'i yi ge h'um yongs su gyur pa las byung
T02D1891:216a-31: ba'i rdo rje de'i lte ba la h'um gnas par
T02D1891:216a-32: bsams la / de'i 'od zer gyis 'gro ba rnams
T02D1891:216a-33: rdo rje 'chang bar byas la slar yang de nyid
T02D1891:216a-34: bsams la / du bcug nas / de yongs su
T02D1891:216a-35: gyur pa las bdag nyid rdo rje 'chang bsku mdog
T02D1891:216a-36: bsams la / du bcug nas / sngo ba / zhal gsum pa zhal g-yas pa dkar ba dang /
T02D1891:216a-38: phyag gnyis kyis rang snang ba'i rig ma la 'khyud pa phyag lhag ma rnams na /
T02D1891:216b-3: nor bu go rims ji lta ba bzhin du bsnams par bsams la /
T02D1891:216b-4: aom dharma dh'a tu badzra sv'a bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1891:216b-5: zhes bya bas nga rgyal bya'o //
T02D1891:216b-6: 'di ni bsnyen pa chung ngu dang /
T02D1891:216b-7: rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu chung ngu'o //
T02D1891:216b-8: de nas mig la sogs pa byin gyis brlab par bya ste /
T02D1891:216b-9: mig gnyis kyi dbus su zla ba la yi ge kshim dang /
T02D1891:216b-10: 'khor lo yongs su gyur pa las sa'i snying po sku mdog dkar po /
T02D1891:216b-11: g-yas pa'i rtsa ba'i phyag na 'khor lo bsnams pa /
T02D1891:216b-12: de'i g-yon du yi ge dzrim dang /
T02D1891:216b-13: me long yongs su gyur pa las gzugs rdo rje sku mdog dkar ba me long bsnams pa'o //
T02D1891:216b-14: rna ba gnyis kyi dbus su zla ba la yi
T02D1891:216b-15: ge dzrim dang rdo rje las byung ba'i phyag na
T02D1891:216b-16: rdo rje sku mdog sngo ba rdo rje bsnams pa'o
T02D1891:216b-17: / de'i g-yon du h'um dang pi wang las byung
T02D1891:216b-18: ba'i sgra rdo rje sngo ba pi wang bsnams pa
T02D1891:216b-19: / / sna bug gnyis su zla ba la kham
T02D1891:216b-20: dang rin po che las byung ba'i nam mkha'i snying
T02D1891:216b-21: po sku mdog ser ba rin po che bsnams pa
T02D1891:216b-22: / / / de'i g-yon du bam dang dri'i dung
T02D1891:216b-23: phor las byung ba'i dri rdo rje sku mdog ser
T02D1891:216b-24: ba dri'i dung phor bsnams pa'o //
T02D1891:216b-25: lce la gam dang padma yongs su gyur pa las 'jig rten dbang phyug sku mdog dmar ba /
T02D1891:216b-27: de'i g-yon du ho dang ro'i snod yongs su gyur pa las ro rdo rje sku mdog dmar ba /
T02D1891:216b-29: spyi bor yi ge ksham dang ral gri las byung ba'i sgrib pa rnam par sel ba /
T02D1891:216b-30: sku mdog ljang gu ral gri bsnams pa /
T02D1891:216b-31: de'i g-yon du kham dang gos sna tshogs las byung
T02D1891:216b-32: ba'i reg rdo rje sku mdog ljang gu gos sna
T02D1891:216b-33: tshogs bsnams pa / lkog ma'i 'og tu yi ge
T02D1891:216b-34: sam dang rdo rje yongs su gyur pa las kun
T02D1891:216b-35: du bzang po sku mdog dkar po rdo rje bsnams
T02D1891:216b-36: tshogs bsnams pa / pa / de'i g-yon du ram
T02D1891:216b-37: dang chos 'byung yongs su gyur pa las chos kyi
T02D1891:216b-38: dbyings rdo rje sku mdog dkar ba chos 'byung ba
T02D1891:216b-40: /'og nas lha rnams thams cad kyang zhal gsum dang phyag drug par bshad de /
T02D1891:216b-41: phyag gnyis kyis rang rang gi thabs dang shes rab la 'khyud pa /
T02D1891:217a-2: sngon po'i g-yas pa dkar ba yin no //
T02D1891:217a-3: ji skad bshad pa'i lha thams cad zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rin po che'i cod pan can /
T02D1891:217a-4: phyag lhag ma rnams ni rdo rje dang /
T02D1891:217a-7: rin po che rim bzhin du bsnams pa /
T02D1891:217a-8: gang gi rtsa ba'i phyag na ral gri'am padma dang /
T02D1891:217a-10: de rnams kyi g-yas kyi rtsa ba'i phyag gnyis pa ni 'khor lo bsnams pa'o //
T02D1891:217a-11: 'di ni nye bar bsgrub pa chung ngu dang rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu chung ngu yin no //
T02D1891:217a-12: de nas snying gar zla ba la gnas pa'i h'um dang rdo rje yongs su gyur pa las /
T02D1891:217a-13: thugs rdo rje sku mdog sngo ba lkog mar padma'i
T02D1891:217a-14: lte bar gnas pa'i aa yongs su gyur pa las
T02D1891:217a-15: gsung rdo rje sku mdog dmar po padma bsnams pa
T02D1891:217a-16: / dpral ba'i nang du 'khor lo'i lte bar gnas
T02D1891:217a-17: pa'i aom dang 'khor lo yongs su gyur pa las
T02D1891:217a-18: sku rdo rje sku mdog dkar ba 'khor lo bsnams
T02D1891:217a-19: / pa / 'di rnams kyi thugs kar go rims bzhin du /
T02D1891:217a-22: 'khor lo'i lte bar h'um dang aa dang aom gnas
T02D1891:217a-23: pa'i 'od zer las byung ba'i gzugs rdo rje la
T02D1891:217a-24: sogs pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs
T02D1891:217a-27: sku rdo rje yang dag par mchod la bkug ste /
T02D1891:217a-28: mdun du bzhugs pa des rang gi thugs dang /
T02D1891:217a-30: sku byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D1891:217a-31: dpal ldan rdo rje thugs 'chang ba //
T02D1891:217a-32: rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas //
T02D1891:217a-33: deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su //
T02D1891:217a-34: rdo rje thugs kyis mdzad du gsol //
T02D1891:217a-35: phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams //
T02D1891:217a-36: rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas //
T02D1891:217a-37: deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su //
T02D1891:217a-38: rdo rje thugs kyis mdzad du gsol //
T02D1891:217a-39: de nas rang gi thugs rdo rje la thugs rdo rje bcug nas /
T02D1891:217a-40: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta tsitta badzra sv'a bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1891:217a-41: zhes bya bas nga rgyal bya'o //
T02D1891:217a-42: chos kyi gsung lam dpal dang ldan //
T02D1891:217a-43: rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas //
T02D1891:217a-44: deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su //
T02D1891:217a-45: rdo rje gsung gis mdzad du gsol //
T02D1891:217a-46: phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams //
T02D1891:217a-47: rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas //
T02D1891:217b-0: @217b deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su //
T02D1891:217b-1: rdo rje gsung gis mdzad du gsol //
T02D1891:217b-2: de nas rang gi gsung rdo rje la gsung rdo rje bcug ste /
T02D1891:217b-3: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta b'aka badzra sv'a bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1891:217b-4: zhes bya ba 'dis nga rgyal bya'o //
T02D1891:217b-5: dpal ldan rdo rje sku 'chang ba //
T02D1891:217b-6: rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas ;
T02D1891:217b-7: / deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su //
T02D1891:217b-8: rdo rje skus ni mdzad du gsol //
T02D1891:217b-9: phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams //
T02D1891:217b-10: rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas //
T02D1891:217b-11: deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su //
T02D1891:217b-12: rdo rje skus ni mdzad du gsol //
T02D1891:217b-13: de nas rang gi sku rdo rje la sku rdo rje bcug ste /
T02D1891:217b-14: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta ya badzra sv'a bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1891:217b-15: zhes bya ba 'dis nga rgyal bya'o //
T02D1891:217b-16: 'di ni sgrub pa chung ngu dang /
T02D1891:217b-17: skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu chung ngu'o //
T02D1891:217b-18: de'i rjes la nu ma'i bar du rdo rje'i dbus
T02D1891:217b-19: su phyi rol gyi rdo rje 'chang ji lta ba
T02D1891:217b-20: de 'dra ba'i ye shes sems dpa' bsgoms la de'i
T02D1891:217b-21: thugs ka'i rdo rje'i lte ba la gnas pa'i yi
T02D1891:217b-22: ge h'um gi 'od zer las byung ba'i gzugs rdo
T02D1891:217b-23: rje la sogs pas nam mkha' la bzhugs pa'i de
T02D1891:217b-24: bzhin gshegs pa rnams yang dag par mchod nas bkug
T02D1891:217b-25: ste / de'i 'od zer las byung ba'i lha mo
T02D1891:217b-26: ye shes kyi bdud rtsis gang ba'i bum pa thogs
T02D1891:217b-27: pa rnams kyis bdag nyid la dbang bskur ba dang
T02D1891:217b-28: ste / / de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i cod pan du gyur par bsam par bya'o //
T02D1891:217b-29: 'di ni sgrub pa chen po'i chung ngu dang /
T02D1891:217b-30: dbang bskur ba'i 'bras bu chung ngu'o //
T02D1891:217b-31: de bzhin du rang gi lha mo bsnyen pa chung
T02D1891:217b-32: ngu la sogs pa'i dbye bas mig la sogs pa
T02D1891:217b-36: sku byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02D1891:217b-37: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba
T02D1891:217b-38: sngon du 'gro bas yan lag bzhi rdzogs par byas
T02D1891:217b-39: la rigs lnga dgod par bya ste /
T02D1891:217b-40: nu ma yan chad aom yongs su gyur pa las rnam par snang mdzad kyi rang bzhin /
T02D1891:217b-41: nu ma'i 'og nas lte ba yan chad kyi bar
T02D1891:217b-42: du h'um yongs su gyur pa las mi bskyod pa'i
T02D1891:217b-43: rang bzhin can / rked pa'i phyogs su sv'a yongs
T02D1891:217b-44: su gyur pa las rin chen 'byung ldan gyi rang
T02D1891:217b-45: rang bzhin can / bzhin / padmar aa yongs su gyur pa las /
T02D1891:218a-2: byin pa gnyis su h'a yongs su gyur pa las
T02D1891:218a-3: don yod par grub pa'i rang bzhin du bsam pa
T02D1891:218a-4: dang / h'um yongs su gyur pa las rang gi rdo rje /
T02D1891:218a-5: aom yongs su gyur pa las nor bu'i bu gar
T02D1891:218a-6: yi ge phat rang dang 'dra ba'i yang h'um yongs
T02D1891:218a-7: su gyur pa las padma a'a:yongs su gyur pa las
T02D1891:218a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod par bya ba'i phyir dang /
T02D1891:218a-10: lhan cig bla na med pa'i dga' ba brtsams la /
T02D1891:218a-11: aom sarbba ta th'a ga t'a nu r'a ga na badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1891:218a-12: zhes bya bas byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D1891:218a-13: 'di ni dang por sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang po'o /
T02D1891:218a-15: // / de'i rjes la de bzhin gshegs pa lnga po rang gi kha'i sgo nas bcug ste /
T02D1891:218a-16: rdo rje'i lam nas phyung nas snga ma bzhin du
T02D1891:218a-17: byang chub kyi sems h'um gis byin gyis brlab par
T02D1891:218a-18: bsams la / de yongs su gyur pa las mi
T02D1891:218a-19: bskyod pa gtso bor gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor
T02D1891:218a-20: lo sprul la rang gzhan gyi don du phyi rol
T02D1891:218a-22: badzra dhrik ces bya bas mi bskyod pa sku mdog
T02D1891:218a-23: nag po rdo rje bsnams pa phyung la spros pa
T02D1891:218a-24: las 'gro ba'i don byas nas slar bsdus te /
T02D1891:218a-25: rang gi lus la dngos po thams cad kyis gzhug par bya'o //
T02D1891:218a-26: de bzhin du thams cad kyang spro zhing bsdu bar bya ste /
T02D1891:218a-27: dzin dzik ces bya bas rnam par snang mdzad sku
T02D1891:218a-28: mdog dkar po phyag na 'khor lo bsnams pa ni
T02D1891:218a-30: ratna dhrik ces bya bas rin chen 'byung ldan sku
T02D1891:218a-31: mdog ser ba rin po che bsnams pa ni lho'i
T02D1891:218a-32: phyogs su'o // a'a ro lik ces bya bas 'od
T02D1891:218a-33: dpag tu med bsku mdog dmar pa padma dmar po
T02D1891:218a-35: pradzny'a dhrik ces bya bas don yod par grub pa
T02D1891:218a-36: sku mdog ljang gu ral gri bsnams pa ni byang
T02D1891:218a-37: du'o // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang ral pa dang cod pan mnga' ba /
T02D1891:218a-38: nyi ma'i gdan dang nyi ma'i 'od mnga' ba'o //
T02D1891:218a-39: mo ha r'a ti zhes bya bas lha mo spyan
T02D1891:218a-40: ma sku mdog dkar mo 'khor lo bsnams pa ni
T02D1891:218a-41: me'i phyogs su'o // dve sha r'a ti zhes bya bas m'a ma k'i sku mdog sngon mo /
T02D1891:218a-42: autpala sngon dmar bsnams pa bden bral gyi phyogs su'o //
T02D1891:218a-43: r'a ga r'a ti zhes bya bas gos dkar mo sku mdog dmar ba /
T02D1891:218b-0: padma @218b dmar po bsnams pa ni rlung gi phyogs su'o //
T02D1891:218b-1: badzra r'a ti zhes bya bas sgrol ma sku mdog
T02D1891:218b-2: ser mo autpala ser po bsnams pa ni dbang ldan
T02D1891:218b-3: gyi phyogs su'o // aom a'a:r'u pa badzri h'um /
T02D1891:218b-4: zhes bya ba la sogs par de kho na nyid
T02D1891:218b-5: gsum dang sbal bas gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa'i
T02D1891:218b-6: lha mo dkyil 'khor gyi grva bzhi dang /
T02D1891:218b-7: shar phyogs kyi sgo'i ngos gnyis su bsam par bya'o //
T02D1891:218b-8: lha mo thams cad kyang rin po che'i cod pan zla ba'i gdan dang zla ba'i 'od mnga' ba'o //
T02D1891:218b-9: ya m'anta krita ces bya bas khro bo gshin rje
T02D1891:218b-10: gshed sku mdog sngo ba rdo rje tho ba bsnams
T02D1891:218b-12: pradzny'anta krita ces bya bas gzhan gyis mi thub pa
T02D1891:218b-13: sku mdog dkar po dbyig ba bsnams pa ni lho
T02D1891:218b-14: sgor ro // padm'a nta krita ces bya bas rta
T02D1891:218b-15: mgrin sku mdog dmar ba padma dmar po bsnams pa
T02D1891:218b-17: bighan'anta krita ces bya bas bdud rtsi thab sbyor sku
T02D1891:218b-18: mdog sngo ba rdo rje sngon po bsnams pa phyung
T02D1891:218b-19: ste / byang gi sgor bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1891:218b-20: khro bo thams cad kyang rnam par 'gyur ba /
T02D1891:218b-22: dbu skra dmar ser gyen du 'bar ba /
T02D1891:218b-25: nyi ma'i gdan dang nyi ma'i 'od mnga' ba'o //
T02D1891:218b-26: de nas rang gi sngags kyi 'od kyis dkyil 'khor
T02D1891:218b-27: gyi 'khor lo bkug la bcug ste dbang du byas
T02D1891:218b-28: la gshin rje gshed la sogs pa nyid kyis bgegs
T02D1891:218b-29: med par byas la rang gi sngags bzlas pa'i mchod
T02D1891:218b-30: yon phul te gshin rje gshed la sogs pa nyid
T02D1891:218b-31: kyis dza:h'um bam ho:/ zhes bya ba dang rim bzhin
T02D1891:218b-32: du rang gi dkyil 'khor du de dgug pa dang
T02D1891:218b-33: kyis dza:h'um bam ho:/ / gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang /
T02D1891:218b-35: 'di dag ni bsnyen pa chen po dang /
T02D1891:218b-36: rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu chen po yin no //
T02D1891:218b-37: de nas snga ma bzhin du thams cad kyi mig
T02D1891:218b-38: la sogs pa byin gyis brlab pa ni bsnyen pa'i
T02D1891:218b-39: yan lag chen po dang rnam par smin pa'i 'bras
T02D1891:218b-40: bu chen po'o // de nas thams cad la ji
T02D1891:218b-41: skad bshad pa'i rim pas thugs dang gsung dang sku
T02D1891:218b-42: byin gyis brlabs pa ni bsnyen pa'i yan lag chen
T02D1891:218b-43: po dang skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu chen po'o
T02D1891:218b-44: bu chen po'o // // thams cad kyi thugs kar
T02D1891:218b-45: gnas pa'i ye shes sems dpa'i sa bon gyi yi
T02D1891:218b-46: ge'i 'od zer gyis nam mkha' la bzhugs pa'i de
T02D1891:219a-1: bsams la / / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la
T02D1891:219a-3: spyan dang gzugs rdo rje dang gshin rje gshed kyi cod pan la ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02D1891:219a-4: m'a ma k'i dang sgra rdo rje dang chos kyi dbyings kyi rdo rje dang /
T02D1891:219a-5: gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyis ni mi bskyod pa'o //
T02D1891:219a-6: gos dkar mo dang rdo rje dang /
T02D1891:219a-7: rta mgrin gyi ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
T02D1891:219a-8: sgrol ma dang reg rdo rje la don yod par grub ba'o //
T02D1891:219a-9: sa'i snying po la sogs pa la ni rang rang
T02D1891:219a-10: gi mdog dang rjes su mthun pa'i de bzhin gshegs
T02D1891:219a-12: kun du bzang po'i cod pan la ni mi bskyod pa'o //
T02D1891:219a-13: 'di dag ni sgrub pa chen po'i yan lag chen po dang dbang bskur ba'i 'bras bu chen po'o //
T02D1891:219a-14: de nas mchod pa byas te /
T02D1891:219a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga kha nas bcug la rdo
T02D1891:219a-16: rje'i lam nas phyung ste snga ma bzhin du byang
T02D1891:219a-17: chub kyi sems su gyur pa dang /
T02D1891:219a-18: rang dang 'dra ba'i rig ma'i ba spu'i bu ga
T02D1891:219a-19: nas gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa lha mo'i tshogs
T02D1891:219a-20: rang rang gi mtshan ma thogs pa dang /
T02D1891:219a-21: mchod pa sna tshogs pa dang yang bcas pa spros
T02D1891:219a-22: pas dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po yang dag par mchod
T02D1891:219a-23: la / aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1891:219a-24: zhes bya ba 'dis byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D1891:219a-25: de nas bdag dkyil 'khor ba dang bcas par bstod pa byas par bsam par bya'o //
T02D1891:219a-26: mi bskyod rdo rje ye shes che //
T02D1891:219a-27: rdo rje dbyings ni mkhas chen po //
T02D1891:219a-28: rdo rje gsum mchog dkyil 'khor gsum //
T02D1891:219a-29: rdo rje dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1891:219a-30: rnam par snang mdzad dag pa che //
T02D1891:219a-31: rdo rje zhi ba dga' chen po //
T02D1891:219a-32: rang bzhin 'od gsal mchog gi mchog //
T02D1891:219a-33: ston pa rdo rje phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1891:219a-34: rin chen rgyal po rab tu bzang //
T02D1891:219a-35: rdo rje nam mkha' dri med mkha' //
T02D1891:219a-36: rang bzhin dag pa gos pa med //
T02D1891:219a-37: rdo rje sku la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1891:219a-38: rdo rje mi 'chi rgyal po che //
T02D1891:219a-39: mi rtog nam mkha' rdo rje 'dzin //
T02D1891:219a-40: 'dod chags pha rol phyin pa brnyes //
T02D1891:219b-0: @219b rdo rje gsung la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1891:219b-1: don yod rdo rje rdzogs sangs rgyas //
T02D1891:219b-2: bsam pa thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa //
T02D1891:219b-3: rang bzhin dag pa nyid las grub //
T02D1891:219b-4: rdo rje sems dpa' phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1891:219b-5: de nas bdud rtsi myong ba byas te /
T02D1891:219b-6: yam las byung ba'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor gzhu'i dbyibs can sngon po ba dan gyis mtshan pa /
T02D1891:219b-7: de'i steng du ram las byung ba'i me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum dmar po /
T02D1891:219b-8: de'i steng du aa las byung ba'i padma'i snod la
T02D1891:219b-9: gnas pa'i bdud rtsi lnga po rnam par snang mdzad
T02D1891:219b-10: la sogs pa'i sa bon las bskyed pa /
T02D1891:219b-11: aom gyis byin gyis brlabs pa de'i yang steng du h'um las byung ba'i rdo rje bsams la /
T02D1891:219b-12: 'bar ba dang sreg pa la sogs pa'i bya bas rdzogs par byas la /
T02D1891:219b-13: aom gyi 'od zer gyis ye shes kyi bdud rtsi drangs la /
T02D1891:219b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang de'i nang du chud par byas te /
T02D1891:219b-15: rang gi sngags kyi sbyin gyis brlabs la /
T02D1891:219b-16: lce la h'um bkod pa'i rdo rje lcer /
T02D1891:219b-17: ro rdo rjes bstabs pas dkyil 'khor pa'i lha rnams dang bcas pa la tshim par bya'o //
T02D1891:219b-18: dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa'o /
T02D1891:219b-20: // / de nas ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka'i sa
T02D1891:219b-21: bon gyi 'od zer gyis 'jig rten gsum po snang
T02D1891:219b-22: bar byas la rdo rje 'chang bar byas te /
T02D1891:219b-23: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lor gzhug par bya'o //
T02D1891:219b-25: bdag nyid kyang ye shes sems dpa' la'o //
T02D1891:219b-26: ye shes sems dpa' yang mtshan ma la'o //
T02D1891:219b-27: mtshan ma yang thig le'i nang du chud par byas
T02D1891:219b-28: la thig le la dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bskyed
T02D1891:219b-29: pa'i rim pas skad cig gis bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1891:219b-30: 'dir bsnyen pa la sogs pa ni chen po'i sgrar brjod par bya'o //
T02D1891:219b-31: yang 'od zer gyi phreng pas sa bon snang bar byas la /
T02D1891:219b-33: mtshan ma las ye shes sems dpa'/
T02D1891:219b-34: ye shes sems dpa' las kyang rdo rje 'chang ba de las kyang dkyil 'khor /
T02D1891:219b-35: dkyil 'khor las kyang 'jig rten gsum por spro ba
T02D1891:219b-36: dang bsdu ba byas la ji srid 'dod kyi bar
T02D1891:219b-37: du bsgom pa ni thig le'i rnal 'byor ro //
T02D1891:219b-38: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa lnga khar bcug la
T02D1891:219b-39: rdo rje'i lam nas phung ste snga ma bzhin du
T02D1891:219b-40: byang chub kyi sems su gyur pa rang dang 'dra
T02D1891:219b-41: pa'i rig ma'i padma'i lte bar /
T02D1891:220a-1: bsams la de'i nang du dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo
T02D1891:220a-2: bskyed pa'i rim pas skad cig tsam gyis bsgom pa
T02D1891:220a-4: 'dir bsnyen pa la sogs pa ni chen po'i sgrar brjod par bya'o //
T02D1891:220a-5: ji srid brtan par ma gyur pa de srid kyi bar du shin tu spro bar mi bya la /
T02D1891:220a-6: brtan par gyur na ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga
T02D1891:220a-7: dang de'i mtshan ma sna tshogs spro bar bya ste
T02D1891:220a-10: zhes zlos shing sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje
T02D1891:220a-11: las re re zhing sku dang gsung thugs gsum gyi
T02D1891:220a-12: bdag nyid can ye shes sems dpa' ni lnga po'i
T02D1891:220a-13: bdag nyid can nyid du de dag thams cad rim
T02D1891:220a-14: gyis sam cig car yang dag par spros la legs
T02D1891:220a-15: par mchod de / nye bar bsdus la /
T02D1891:220a-16: dbugs rngub pa dang dbyung bas dal ba dang ring
T02D1891:220a-17: ba med par bzla bar bya zhing sngags la yang
T02D1891:220a-18: zhen pa med par gsang sngags bzla bar bya'o //
T02D1891:220a-19: bde ba la shin tu zhen na sngar bshad pa'i glus bskul la 'khor lo mchod par bya'o //
T02D1891:220a-20: skyo bar gyur na mtho gang tsam gyis dpags par
T02D1891:220a-21: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i yi ge aom
T02D1891:220a-22: byang chub kyi sems kyi 'dod zer gyi phreng ba
T02D1891:220a-23: dang bcas pa dbugs dbyung ba dang rngub pa'i lcags
T02D1891:220a-24: kyus drangs la bdag nyid tshim par bya'o //
T02D1891:220a-25: gshegs su gsol bar 'dod na mchod pa la sogs
T02D1891:220a-26: pa byas la sa bon gyi sngags kyis 'khor lo
T02D1891:220a-27: bdag nyid kyi nang du chud par byas la sku
T02D1891:220a-28: la sogs par byin gyis brlabs par bsams la /
T02D1891:220a-29: sems can la phan pa'i phyir smon lam byas nas /
T02D1891:220a-30: rang gi lha'i nga rgyal du byas la yul rnams gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa'i rnam pa'am /
T02D1891:220a-31: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa dang /
T02D1891:220a-32: rdo rje 'chang dang 'dra bar blta bar bya ste /
T02D1891:220a-33: 'di nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa yin no //
T02D1891:220a-34: zas la spyad pa'i dus su snying gar zla ba
T02D1891:220a-35: la gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo dmigs la
T02D1891:220a-36: rang gi zas bdud rtsi lnga'i rang bzhin can du
T02D1891:220a-37: bsams la / rang gi sngags kyang mngon par bzlas
T02D1891:220a-38: la sku la sogs pa'i lha rnams tshim par byas
T02D1891:220a-39: bsams la / te / 'di nyid ni nang gi sbyin sreg yin no //
T02D1891:220a-40: de bzhin du 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas bdag dang
T02D1891:220b-0: gzhan la mchod pa ni de @220b bzhin gshegs pa'i
T02D1891:220b-2: de lta bu'i sdom pa dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor
T02D1891:220b-3: pas bdag dang gzhan la mchod pa'i bde bar gshegs
T02D1891:220b-4: pa mchod pa gang cung zad ci byed pa thams
T02D1891:220b-5: cad phyag rgya dang sngags kyi rnam pa yin zhing
T02D1891:220b-6: kha na ma tho ba med pas 'tshang rgya ba
T02D1891:220b-7: nyid thob par byed pa yin no //
T02D1891:220b-8: dam tshig nyams pa la dam tshig rdo rje'i rnal
T02D1891:220b-9: 'byor pas sna tshogs padma la gnas pa'i sna tshogs
T02D1891:220b-10: rdo rje la bzhugs pa'i ye shes sems dpa' cho
T02D1891:220b-12: sngar bshad pa'i cho gas dbang bskur ba byas la bzlas brjod la sogs pa bya'o //
T02D1891:220b-13: phyi'i khrus la yang rim pa 'di nyid khyad par du bstan par bya'o //
T02D1891:220b-14: thun gyi tha ma yang de bzhin du mchod pa
T02D1891:220b-15: la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas bzlas brjod byas
T02D1891:220b-16: la snying gar 'khor lo bsdus te snying rje dang
T02D1891:220b-17: shes rab tu ldan pas nyal bar bya'o //
T02D1891:220b-18: langs pa'i dus su spyan la sogs pa'i glus bdag
T02D1891:220b-19: nyid yang dag par bskul la snga ma bzhin du
T02D1891:220b-21: mig la sogs pa byin gyis brlab pa byas la
T02D1891:220b-22: dkyil 'khor spros te bzlas brjod la sogs pa bya'o
T02D1891:220b-23: // dngos grub bsgrubs nas sngar bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa nyid kyis bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D1891:220b-24: bgegs ni bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi 'khor lor bsams pas 'bad mi dgos par 'joms par 'gyur ro //
T02D1891:220b-25: las kyi rgyal po mchod ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gsum pa'o //
T02D1891:220b-26: rab tu gsal ba zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs
T02D1891:220b-27: slob dpe med pa'i rdo rje mdzad pa rdzogs so
T02D1891:220b-29: / // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po b'irya bha dra dang /
